file_content.text: You took those wretches down, you are more than welcome to the reward. Talk to Androclus.
Unless you're here to say you got me a free ticket home, or those beasts are dead, I don't want to hear it.
Get out while you can! There's nothing they can pay to make this job worth it!
I hope you all have your own ship, or you'll be stuck here like the rest of us.
Oh, my apologies, Master Jedi. I thought for a second you were a hired grunt like the rest of us.
Uh, no offense, sir. I'm just a hired merc; figure they give us the jobs that are too nasty for the guys in uniform.
Take your ship and get out. There's no amount of hazard pay to make this worth it.
Like rakghouls aren't bad enough? They need to start breeding in the middle of a blasted nuclear reactor? Makes 'em twice the size and mean.
Do you need help?
That's awful generous. How do you feel about dying of an irradiated rakghoul bite?
Who are you?
What are you talking about?
Name's Larris Cozekk. The Republic hired us to clear this wasteland for settlement. What a joke!
I went into the rakghoul warren right over that way. With two dozen men! I'm the only one who crawled out alive.
They're swimming in radiation. They've mutated into monsters that don't slow down even when you blast their brains onto the wall.
I've yet to meet a beast that can stand up to the Force.
I can handle it.
Good. Because a blaster was about as effective as a water gun.
The Force can calm the rage even in them.
I can handle them.
No offense, Master Jedi, but good blasted luck.
These creatures must be cleared out.
I can handle this.
I couldn't agree more. As long as I'm not the one doing it.
When you said no amount of money would be worth it... can you define that amount more exactly?
What are you earning?
If you can destroy these beasts, I'll give you everything I'm being paid for my whole term of service!
Watch me.
If they aren't destroyed down to the last beast, the whole settlement will be a graveyard!
Once you're done--if you live, talk to Androclus Methodius there; he's heading up this task force.
I'll leave. [Refuse quest]
Warn anyone else--Taris will never be settled. We should all leave with our lives!
Never should have taken this job.
